overview:
Manjot Deol works as Director for Marketing & Commercial Operations at GE Healthcare, ASEAN Region. He is based out of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Manjot holds a Bachelor of Engineering (Electronics) degree and MDP from Indian Institute of Management, Bangalore. He has over 17 years of experience in the Healthcare equipment and IT industry - starting off as a filed engineer and moving to product sales, country management, IT business management and regional commercial operations and marketing.
